# Codebook {.tabset2}

```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
pander::panderOptions("table.split.table", Inf)
```


## Load
```{r}
library(formr)
source("/Volumes/jet/single_preferences/.passwords.R")
formr_connect(credentials$email, credentials$password)
formr_results("s2_initial", quiet = T) -> s2_initial
library(dplyr)
s2_initial = s2_initial %>% select(session, created, expired, ended, bfi_extra,bfi_agree, bfi_extra_1, partner_feel_safe, partner_height)
```

```{r}
codebook(s2_initial)
```
